text: Remember is a Canadian-German 2015 drama-thriller movie directed by Atom Egoyan and written by Benjamin August. It stars Christopher Plummer, Bruno Ganz, JÃ¼rgen Prochnow, Heinz Lieven, Dean Norris and Martin Landau. The plot follows an elderly Holocaust survivor with dementia who sets out to kill a Nazi war criminal. It was released on October 23, 2015 in Canada and on December 31, 2015 in Germany. The movie received positive reviews as they liked Plummer's performance. ==References== Category:German drama movies Category:German thriller movies Category:Canadian drama movies Category:Canadian thriller movies Category:2010s English-language movies Category:2015 drama movies Category:2015 thriller movies Category:2010s drama thriller movies Category:Holocaust movies Category:Movies about revenge Category:Movies directed by Atom Egoyan
title: Remember (2015 movie)
